text: Robert Breckenridge Ware "Robin" MacNeil, OC (January 19, 1931 - April 12, 2024) was a Canadian-American journalist and writer. He was a television news anchor who partnered with Jim Lehrer to create The MacNeil/Lehrer Report in 1975.Robert MacNeil Biography (1931–) MacNeil died at the NewYork-Presbyterian Hospital in New York City on April 12, 2024, at the age of 93.Robert MacNeil, urbane anchor who founded ‘PBS NewsHour,’ dies at 93 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Canadian journalists Category:American journalists Category:American television news anchors Category:Writers from Montreal
